snippet: With a clutch of recent roles that allow him to be villainous, look ordinary and even grow a paunch, Jude Law is letting go of being a heartthrob and getting down to the more interesting business of being an actor.
lead_paragraph: With a clutch of recent roles that allow him to be villainous, look ordinary and even grow a paunch, Jude Law is letting go of being a heartthrob and getting down to the more interesting business of being an actor.

headline.main: Who Are You Calling Pretty Boy?
